Build-Depends: chrpath, cmake, cpio, debhelper-compat (= 13), hwdata, hyprland-protocols (>= 0.2+20240505), hyprwayland-scanner (>= 0.3.10), libcairo-dev, libdrm-dev, libxkbcommon-dev, libegl-dev, libegl1-mesa-dev, libgles-dev, libhyprlang-dev (>= 0.3.2), libhyprcursor-dev (>= 0.1.7), libhyprutils-dev (>= 0.1.5), libinput-dev, libpango1.0-dev, libpixman-1-dev, libseat-dev, libtomlplusplus-dev, libudev-dev, libudis86-dev (>= 0+20221013), libwayland-dev, libwlroots-0.18-dev, libxcb-errors-dev, libxcb-util-dev, meson, ninja-build, pkgconf, wayland-protocols, xwayland
Package-List: hyprland deb x11 optional arch=any hyprland-backgrounds deb x11 optional arch=all hyprland-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any
